concept.title: Environment setup - Introduction
concept.shortdesc: Tools setup to build the user guide for the Panecal Scientific Calculator.

conbody.p: To build the user guide for the Panecal Scientific Calculator, you must first set up the environment on your computer as follows:

ul.li: Install the trial version of Oxygen XML authoring tool (version 25.0 above).
Upload the Oxygen XML files in a public GitHub repository.
Publish and share your deliverable using the public GitHub repository.

image.alt: A graphic displaying the system requirements before you set up the environment for building your User Guide.
